Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.controller

Class NormalSceneController

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.controller.NormalSceneController
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameEndMenuController, GuidanceController, MainMenuController, PreferencesController, RankingListController, UsernameFormController
public abstract class NormalSceneController extends Object
Abstract class NormalSceneController is the base class for those controllers whose scene is at the same level of the game board.

By keeping the instance of class StartGame (Main class), controllers can call the methods in class StartGame to change the root of the scene of the stage, which realizes the function of switching scenes.

Additionally, because class StartGame also keeps the instance of class GameBoard, we can get the GameBoard instance by calling the public getter method and use it to access/modify the fields of the game board to do some simple data interaction between scenes.

Author:
Ning ZHU
